mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RM, human.* FROM (SELECT * FROM comments WHERE pagegroup BETWEEN #{pageCountBlock} and #{page} and commentgroup=0 and bookarticlenum=#{bookArticleNum} ORDER BY pagegroup desc,commentNUM desc) human)
